author: halfinney.
content: once Phase 1.5 goes live, what is the increase in throughput expected compared to the current number?

author: djrtwo
content:
you might see marginal increases due to regular/faster block times. The major gains in a phase 1.5 will be in access to a highly scalable data layer
The obvious application that benefits from this (and scales) are rollup chains. Beyond that, I do expect there to be much innovation in the application layer leveraging layer 1 data

so the answer is "not much increase, unless you are running the numbers on rollups. if rollups, then massive increase over what tehy can do on mainnet today"
